contentrichtext.text: '''NKC is a three letter abbreviation that may refer to:''' *The [[IATA]] [[airport code]] for [[Nouakchott International Airport]] *The [[National Kennel Club]], an all-breed dog registry in the United States. *[[Nat King Cole]], an American jazz singer/musician *The [[Northwest Kidney Centers]], the worldâ€™s first outpatient hemodialysis treatment center. *[[Natural killer cell]], a cell involved in the innate immune system. *[[National Knowledge Commission]], and Indian Commission set up by [[Dr. Manmohan Singh]] the [[Prime Minister]] of India. *National Kevin City, a town located in America. {{disambig}}
